topic.title: Poland being the last keep of the true European values?
topic.body:
Did you guys see the videos from yesterday's Polish Independence March in Warsaw? Under the president's patronage, all kinds of nationalistic, anti-immigration and anti-gay voices were heard. The feminist protesters were beaten and thrown away from the march's way.
Did you know? The streets in Poland are safe at night, you will only be punched if you go to one of the tiny, isolated gypsy areas, there are no muslim zones! The only non-white people who appear in Poland are tourists because there is a very strong movement against mixing the superior white genes with mud-colored genes from Africa and South Asia.
Poland is currently the Europe's capitol of Order, Purity and God. And you can rent a hotel room for as little as $40 per night! And the chicks love rich foreigners! I will definitely visit there again!

1541030608_1CrzoomCXRHkg6vqaRXwffoMkWMjk.body: Hitler was right, but Stalin had more manpower.
